ai-patthana16.4:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.4:0.3_0: Transmigration with the cause, for the sake of goodness,
ai-patthana16.4:1.1_0: Not cause or reasoning cause or condition, it doesn’t give rise to a cause or reason for the sake of a skillful teaching.
ai-patthana16.4:1.1_1: (They are) skilled in this way without cause or reason, without cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.4:1.1_2: (That’s) skillful, without cause or reason, without cause or reason, because of the cause or reason, and with the reason, without cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.4:2.1_0: Visible in this way, do not give rise to the cause or condition for the sake of a cause or condition. ...
ai-patthana16.4:3.1_0: (This) doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason for the sake of this skillful. Yet only give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.4:3.1_1: (This) doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason for the sake of this skillful teaching. Yet only give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.4:3.1_2: Though cause or reason, both these things aren’t rooted inappropriate, or cause or reason, there’s no cause or reason for cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.4:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.4:4.1_0: the result of nine prominent speech ...
ai-patthana16.4:5.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to cause or reason for the sake of a skillful or unskillful.
ai-patthana16.4:5.1_1: A skillful teaching are not rooted in both ways. It doesn’t cause or reasoned with cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.4:5.1_2: It is skillful or rooted in both ways.
ai-patthana16.4:6.1_2: It’s not unskillful because of cause or reason, nor because of what’s unskillful and no cause or condition, nor by cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.4:7.1_0: Not cause or reasoning or reason, it doesn’t give rise to cause or reason for the sake of a without cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.4:7.1_1: Not cause or reasoning or reason, there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.4:7.1_2: Though this isn’t rooted in both ways and isn’t skilled in reasons, not skilled in cause or reasons, because of cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.4:7.1_3: This is the section in brief.
